column4: ok I had the nvidia 180.29 drivers installed from the website and I installed made the mistake of turning on the 177 drivers in the "hardware drivers" section no when I boot up "X" won't load :-( can anyone help me undo this?
I did ctrl+alt+f1 and did sudo /etc/init.d/gdm stop
is there a way to undo the driver install from system > administration > hardware drivers (from the cmd line?)
maybe, but  if you re boot your computer and go into recovery mode, you can restore X, and bye bye your driver
